title: APPROPRIATIONS – PUBLIC UTILITIES COMMISSION – STATE TAX COMMISSION – INDUSTRIAL COMMISSION – Provides appropriations for a statutory increase to commissioner salaries of the Public Utilities Commission, Industrial Commission, and State Tax Commission.
subject: APPROPRIATIONS
INDUSTRIAL COMMISSION
TAX AND TAXATION
UTILITIES
